effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 10 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: (2) Set: Shield of the Righteous deals 10% increased damage and grants 3% damage reduction.
(4) Set: Casting a Holy Power ability increases the damage and healing you deal during your next Avenging Wrath by 0.5%. This effect stacks.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Falling below 60% health surrounds you with a protective vortex of junk, reducing damage taken by 50% for 15 sec or until 1.3 million damage is prevented. This effect may only occur every 30 sec.

After 20 sec without activating while in combat, the Scrapfield overloads to energize you with 3,064 Haste for 12 sec.

Equip: Your attacks have a chance to call to the pact, exploding for 138,045 Shadow damage split between nearby enemies and increasing your Haste by 902 for 10 sec.

Your death breaks the pact, causing a violent explosion.
Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,024 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.
Equip: You champion the cause of the Wyrmrest Accord.  All reputation gains while in Northrend dungeons will be applied to your standing with them.
